startdescription.string: You start out in the cozy town of Bree.
The perfect place to look for new adventures!

menudescription.string: ~As you walk down the street of Bree,
you can hear townsfolk chatting all around you~

startdescription.string: "Ah, the beautiful city of Minas Tirith!
A sanctuary in the bewildered land of Gondor."

menudescription.string: ~The sight of white almost blinds your eyes
as you walk around in the extraordinary Minas Tirith~
